api.apiRequestFailed: Interface request failed, please try again later!
api.apiTimeoutMessage: The interface query timed out, please refresh the page and try again!
api.errMsg401: User does not have authorization (token, username or password error)!
api.errMsg403: The user is authorized, but access is prohibited!
api.errMsg404: Network request error, resource was not found!
api.errMsg405: Network request error, request method not allowed!
api.errMsg500: Server error, please contact the administrator!
api.errMsg503: The service is unavailable, the server is temporarily overloaded or under maintenance!
api.errMsg505: The HTTP version does not support the request!
api.errorMessage: The operation failed, the system is abnormal!
api.networkExceptionMsg:
Please check if your network connection is normal! 
The network is abnormal
api.timeoutMessage: Connection time expired, please log in again!

exception.networkErrorSubTitle: Sorry, your network connection was interrupted, please check your network!
exception.subTitle403: Sorry, you do not have access to this page.
exception.subTitle404: Sorry, the page you visited does not exist.
exception.subTitle500: Sorry, the server is reporting an error.

lock.placeholder: Please enter the screen lock password or user password

login.loginSuccessDesc: Good to see you again { username }
login.scanSign: scan the code to complete the connection
login.signInDesc: Enter your personal information and get started!
